Have a delicious food at available restaurants !!

{{restaurant.restaurantName}}

Location: {{restaurant.location}}
Rating: {{restaurant.rating}}

import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { RestaurantServiceService } from '../service/restaurant-service.service'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-restaurant-view', templateUrl: './restaurant-view.component.html', styleUrls: ['./restaurant-view.component.css'] }) export class RestaurantViewComponent { constructor(private service:RestaurantServiceService,private route:Router,private activatedRoute:ActivatedRoute){ } restaurantItems:any=[]; ngOnInit(): void { this.service.getAllRestaurant().subscribe( response=>{ this.restaurants=response; }, error=>{ alert("error!!!!"); } ) } getItems(id:number) { this.service.getId(id); this.route.navigateByUrl('/viewItem'); } @Input('restaurants') restaurants:any = []; getLocation(location:any){ this.getLocation(location); this.service.getRestaurantByLocation(location).subscribe( (response: Object) => { const restaurantArray = response as any[]; if(location && location !== ''){ this.restaurants = restaurantArray.filter((restaurant:any) => restaurant.location === location); } else { this.restaurants = restaurantArray; console.log(restaurantArray); } }, error=>{ alert("error!!!!"); } ) } onSearchTextChanged(searchText:string) { if(searchText || searchText !== ''){ this.restaurantItems.filter() } else this.notes = data; }, error:e=>{ alert("Network error !! please try again later"); } }) } }
